name: The Final Book
description:
Your an author who is writing their final book... before a haunter comes to get you but maybe it's just too late

This game was made in 2 days!

How to play:

  1. Listen close to the doors, if you hear breathing then close it until the breathing stops
  2. When you hear a knock close the curtains on the window behind you!

Controls:

Use mouse to look around

WASD to move

E to interact
